mapper.select: select t1.pkid as pkid ,t1.`type` as `type` ,t1.content as content ,DATE_FORMAT(t1.`created`,'%Y-%m-%d') as created ,( case when t2.user_name is not null then t2.user_name else t2.nike_name end ) as userName ,t2.phone_no as phone from tb_feedback t1 join sys_user_info t2 on t1.fb_user_id = t2.pkid and t2.is_enable = 1 order by t1.created desc limit #{start},#{pageSize}
select count(1) from tb_feedback t1 join sys_user_info t2 on t1.fb_user_id = t2.pkid and t2.is_enable = 1 order by t1.created desc
